comments.author: Adriana
comments.body: Hear hear! I'm holed up in my 3rd story office watching the throngs pass below. You should have seen the masses I waded through to get to Physics this morning. Back to the grind. In any event, hope the ride is great. Espresso and I got out for a sweet run on the trails this morning. We wish you a happy cycle! -A

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: One more thought. This one, courtesy of Sam Harris, concerns hearing "voices:" "The President of the United States has claimed, on more than one occasion, to be in dialogue with God. Now, if he said that he was talking to God through his hairdryer, this would precipitate a national emergency. I fail to see how the addition of a hairdryer makes a difference." At least my voices don't affect the future of the planet... But I'm trying.
